page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: {Monday 15th of July 1985} My name is Steven Crook and I was born 2nd December 1971.My school is Frank Montgomery.I live in the village of STURRY. My form is 2A and there are 9 boys and 10 girls in my form. Today.Monday 15th July, I got up at quarter to seven,had a wash and got dressed.I made myself a cup of tea and sorted my books out . I had breakfast at 7.30am,left for school at 8.05am after walking about 2 miles.Todays lessons are History , Geography, Music French , English , R.E , Science.Leave school at 3.15pm arrive home at 3,40pm. Before tea I had to take my dog over the woods.Had tea at 6.00pm, I had, potatoes, chicken, peas, carrots, cabbage.After tea I watched television.
